thoughts: Wonders if {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} would have gotten the chance to do r_c's first check-up
Can still smell the bitter herbs that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} desperately fetched to try and save r_c's life
Thought {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} heard r_c's mewls, but was wrong
Contemplates how short r_c's life was and how much {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/are/is} missing
Is questioning if r_c would grow up in StarClan or stay a newborn
Prays that r_c is healthy and receives the strength {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} need to grow in StarClan
Is finally accepting {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} did all {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could to save r_c
Is pondering which role r_c would have been
Ponders how StarClan would deal with r_c
Thought {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} encountered r_c while scavenging for herbs, but it was a trick of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} mind
Is listening to the reason behind r_c's name with a fond smile
Wonders if newborn kits grow up to be adults or stay young forever in StarClan
Is asking StarClan why they take newborns to Silverpelt
Prays that all the newborn kits in StarClan get enough food to stay strong
Is contemplating StarClan and why they would allow newborns to pass
Is reflecting on r_c's pelt, and is sad {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} never knew {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} eye color
Was startled to meet a newborn kit while dreaming and ponders what it meant
Was spooked when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} encountered a ghostly newborn while collecting herbs, which disappeared when noticed
Is asking {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} mentor why StarClan allows newborns to join Silverpelt
Is vowing to never let another newborn join StarClan's ranks
Is wondering if r_c was a part of the stars last night
Thought {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} heard r_c's mewls, but it was just the wind
Is questioning who would provide for r_c in StarClan
Wonders if r_c would have played with the insects in the grass if {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} had time to grow up
Questions if r_c's spirit exists in the tall grasses
Thought {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} saw r_c's spirit hanging around the nursery tunnel
Wonders if r_c gets to venture out of the tunnels in StarClan
Thought {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} saw r_c playing with the roots of the tree, but sadly shakes off the thought
Was surprised to find r_c's spot in the nursery warm, despite {PRONOUN/r_c/object} being with the stars now
Is pondering if r_c would stay in tunnels or go out an explore the territory in StarClan
Wonders if the newborns in StarClan will ever get to play and run across open fields
Prays to StarClan that the passed newborn kits get to feel the wind across their pelt
Is wondering if r_c would have been {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} friend
Wonders if {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} would have swapped secrets with r_c

Helps apply a poultice to a small wound
Is enjoying learning all of the herbs a medicine cat needs!
Is memorizing the names of all the herbs
Is practicing applying cobwebs to wounds
Is sorting out all the old herbs from the den
Makes sure the nests in the medicine den are as comfortable as possible
Is ready to take care of any patients
Is a bit overwhelmed at everything there is to learn about healing
Is learning the best way to remove a thorn from a paw pad
Is learning how to treat a burn
Is learning how to tell the difference between whitecough and greencough from a safe distance
Is taking {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} training very seriously
Is learning the early signs of infection
Is memorizing all the places catmint grows
Wonders if StarClan will send {PRONOUN/m_c/object} a practice sign before a real one

Wonders if r_c would have wanted to be a medicine cat too
Wonders if r_c would have been a better healer

Wishes {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} understood the apprentice's inside jokes
Hopes r_c will come with {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to help gather herbs
Is assuring r_c that everything is okay
Is wondering if StarClan is visiting r_c's dreams
Is realizing how lonely it can be to be a medicine cat apprentice

Was asked to gather fresh moss for the elders' bedding
Plans to visit the elders soon
Is checking in on the elder's den
Plans to help the elders with their ticks
Is helping to repair the elder's den
Is making sure r_c is breathing okay
Is hoping to make r_c feel younger today
Is learning how to relieve r_c's joint pain
Is studying the effects of aging with r_c's reluctant help
Wants to help r_c gather fresh herbs
Is watching r_c work

Is always worrying about {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} patients

Wants to learn some battle moves... just in case

Is wondering if StarClan uses greencough to weed out the weaker members of the clan
